name: SPYRAL MISSION - Rescue
text: Destroy this card during your 3rd End Phase after activation. Once per turn: You can target 1 "SPYRAL" monster in your Graveyard; return it to the hand. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 "SPYRAL" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it. You can only control 1 "SPYRAL MISSION - Rescue".
